Name: Charge!
Description: Elite Shout. (5...11...13 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 33% faster. Initial effect: these allies lose the Crippled condition.

Name: Coward!
Description: Elite Shout. Causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

Name: Fear Me!
Description: Shout. (1...12...15 seconds.) You have +5...25...30% chance of a critical hit with melee attacks against stationary foes. Initial effect: nearby foes lose 1...3...4 Energy.

Name: For Great Justice!
Description: Shout. (20 seconds.) You gain 100% more adrenaline.

Name: For Great Justice! (PvP)
Description: Shout. (8 seconds.) You gain 1 extra strike of adrenaline whenever you hit with an attack.

Name: I Meant to Do That!
Description: Shout. You gain 1...4...5 strikes of adrenaline if you are knocked-down.

Name: I Will Avenge You!
Description: Shout. You have +3...6...7 Health regeneration and attack 25% faster (10 seconds for each dead ally).

Name: I Will Survive!
Description: Shout. (5...10...11 seconds.) You have +3 Health regeneration for each condition on you.

Name: None Shall Pass!
Description: Shout. Knocks down all nearby moving foes. Recharges 1...7...8 seconds faster for each affected foe (maximum 25 seconds).

Name: On Your Knees!
Description: Shout. Recharges all your stances if you are adjacent to a knocked-down foe. You lose all adrenaline.

Name: Retreat!
Description: Shout. (5...10...11 seconds.) Party members in earshot move 33% faster. No effect unless there are dead allies within earshot.

Name: Save Yourselves!
Description: Shout. (4...6 seconds.) All other party members gain +100 armor.

Name: Shields Up!
Description: Shout. (5...10...11 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +60 armor against projectile attacks.

Name: To the Limit!
Description: Shout. (10...18...20 seconds.) You have +10...50...60 maximum Health. Initial effect: you gain one strike of adrenaline for each foe within earshot (maximum 1...5...6).

Name: Victory Is Mine!
Description: Elite Shout. You gain 10...56...68 Health and 3...6...7 Energy for each condition on target foe.

Name: Watch Yourself!
Description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +5...21...25 armor. Ends after 10 incoming attacks.

Name: Watch Yourself! (PvP)
Description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +5...21...25 armor. Ends after 1...3...3 incoming attacks.

Name: You Will Die!
Description: Shout. You gain 1...3...3 strikes of adrenaline. No effect unless target foe is under 50% Health.

Name: You're All Alone!
Description: Elite Shout. Inflicts Cripple and Weakness conditions (8 seconds). No effect if target foe is near one of its allies.

Name: Agonizing Chop
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Interrupts an action if target foe has a Deep Wound.

Name: Auspicious Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and you gain 3...7...8 Energy. Unblockable if target foe is Weakened.

Name: Auspicious Parry
Description: Elite Stance. (8 seconds.) Blocks one attack. End effect: you gain 1...3...4 strikes of adrenaline.

Name: Axe Rake
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +1...8...10 damage and inflicts Crippled condition (15 seconds) if target foe has a Deep Wound.

Name: Axe Twist
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +1...16...20 damage and inflicts Weakness condition (20 seconds) if target foe has a Deep Wound.

Name: Backbreaker
Description: Elite Hammer Attack. Deals +1...16...20 damage. Causes knockdown. Knockdown lasts 4 seconds with Strength 8 or higher.

Name: Balanced Stance
Description: Stance. (8...18...20 seconds.) You cannot be knocked-down and do not take extra damage from critical hits.

Name: Barbarous Slice
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +5...25...30 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...13...15 seconds) if you are not in a stance.

Name: Battle Rage
Description: Elite Stance. (5...17...20 seconds.) You move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from your attacks. Ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.

Name: Belly Smash
Description: Hammer Attack. Inflicts Blindness condition to adjacent foes (3...6...7 seconds) if target foe is knocked down.

Name: Berserker Stance
Description: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. Ends if you use a skill.

Name: Body Blow
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound (0...12...15 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

Name: Bonetti's Defense
Description: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Gain 5 Energy for each melee attack blocked. Ends if you use a skill.

Name: Bull's Charge
Description: Elite Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. Causes knock-down if you hit a moving foe in melee. Ends if you use a skill.

Name: Bull's Strike
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +5...25...30 damage and causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

Name: Burst of Aggression
Description: Stance. (2...8...10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. End effect: lose all adrenaline.

Name: Charging Strike
Description: Elite Stance. (1...8...10 seconds.) You move 33% faster and deal +10...34...40 damage with your next melee hit. Ends when you hit or if you use a skill.

Name: Cleave
Description: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +10...26...30 damage.

Name: Counter Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

Name: Counterattack
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +5...29...35 damage. You gain 2...5...6 Energy if target foe is attacking.

Name: Crippling Slash
Description: Elite Sword Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...13...15 seconds) and Bleeding condition (10...22...25 seconds).

Name: Critical Chop
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Interrupts an action if you land a critical hit.

Name: Crude Swing
Description: Hammer Attack. Attack all adjacent foes for +1...16...20 damage.

Name: Crushing Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +1...16...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition if target foe is knocked-down (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Cyclone Axe
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +4...10...12 damage to all foes adjacent to you.

Name: Deadly Riposte
Description: Skill. (8 seconds). You block the next melee attack and your attacker takes 15...75...90 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition. (3...21...25 seconds). No effect unless you have a sword equipped.

Name: Decapitate
Description: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +5...41...50 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds). Automatic critical hit. You lose all adrenaline and Energy.

Name: Defensive Stance
Description: Stance. (1...4...5 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. End effect: gain one adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum 0...3...4).

Name: Deflect Arrows
Description: Stance. (1...5...6 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block attacks. Adjacent foes suffer Bleeding (5...13...15 seconds) when you block a projectile attack.

Name: Defy Pain
Description: Elite Skill. (20 seconds.) You have +90...258...300 maximum Health

Name: Defy Pain (PvP)
Description: Elite Stance. (20 seconds.) You have +90...258...300 maximum Health and +20 armor.

Name: Desperation Blow
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. Inflicts one of the following random conditions: Deep Wound (20 seconds)
Activation: or Crippled (15 seconds). You are knocked-down.

Name: Devastating Hammer
Description: Elite Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Disarm
Description: Sword Attack. Interrupts target foe. Interruption effect: disables this foe's attack skills (0...2...3 seconds) if that action was an attack.

Name: Disciplined Stance
Description: Stance. (1...3...4 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block and +10 armor. Ends if you use an adrenal skill.

Name: Dismember
Description: Axe Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Disrupting Chop
Description: Axe Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

Name: Distracting Blow
Description: Melee Attack. Also attacks foes adjacent to your target. Interrupts an action. Hits for no damage.

Name: Distracting Strike
Description: Melee Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: Disables interrupted skill (20 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor. Deals no damage.

Name: Dolyak Signet
Description: Signet. (8...18...20 seconds.) You have +10...34...40 armor and cannot be knocked-down. You move 75% slower.

Name: Dragon Slash
Description: Elite Sword Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. You gain 1...4...5 strikes of adrenaline if it hits.

Name: Drunken Blow
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. Inflicts one of the following random conditions: Deep Wound (20 seconds)
Activation: or Crippled (15 seconds). You are knocked-down.

Name: Dwarven Battle Stance
Description: Elite Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster
Energy: and your attack skills interrupt actions. No effect unless you have a hammer equipped.

Name: Earth Shaker
Description: Elite Hammer Attack. Knocks down target and adjacent foes. 50% failure chance unless Hammer Mastery is 5 or more.

Name: Endure Pain
Description: Skill. (7...16...18 seconds.) You have +90...258...300 maximum Health.

Name: Enraged Smash
Description: Elite Hammer Attack. Gives you 1...3...4 strikes of adrenaline if you hit. Deals +10...34...40 damage and causes knockdown if target foe was moving.

Name: Enraged Smash (PvP)
Description: Elite Hammer Attack. Gives you 1...3...4 strikes of adrenaline if you hit. Deals +10...34...40 damage and causes knockdown if target foe was moving.

Name: Enraging Charge
Description: Stance. (5...13...15 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Gain +0...2...3 adrenaline on your next melee attack. Ends after your next hit.

Name: Eviscerate
Description: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +1...25...31 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Executioner's Strike
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage.

Name: Fierce Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound (1...7...8 seconds) if target foe is Weakened.

Name: Final Thrust
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...32...40 damage. Deals +1...32...40 more damage if target foe is below 50% Health. Lose all adrenaline.

Name: Flail
Description: Stance. (1...12...15 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. You move 33% slower.

Name: Flourish
Description: Elite Skill. Recharges your attack skills. You gain 2...6...7 Energy for each skill recharged.

Name: Flurry
Description: Stance. (5 seconds). You attack 33% faster. You do 25% less damage.

Name: Forceful Blow
Description: Elite Hammer Attack. Deals +10...26...30 damage. Remove target foe's stance. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds). Unblockable.

Name: Frenzied Defense
Description: Stance. (8 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. You take double damage.

Name: Frenzy
Description: Stance. (8 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. You take double damage.

Name: Furious Axe
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...29...35 damage. Gives you 3 strikes of adrenaline if blocked.

Name: Galrath Slash
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...32...40 damage.

Name: Gash
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) if your target is Bleeding.

Name: Gladiator's Defense
Description: Elite Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Your attacker takes 5...29...35 damage whenever you block a melee attack this way.

Name: Grapple

Name: Griffon's Sweep

Name: Hammer Bash
Description: Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Lose all adrenaline.

Name: Keen Chop
Description: Axe Attack. Always a critical hit.

Name: Lacerating Chop
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

Name: Leviathan's Sweep
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Causes knock-down and deals 10...29...34 damage if blocked.

Description: Elite Melee Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Unblockable if target foe is enchanted.

Name: Mighty Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage.

Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and you gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.

Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +1...16...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down

Name: Penetrating Blow
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. 20% armor penetration.

Description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. 20% armor penetration.

Name: Power Attack
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage.

Name: Primal Rage
Description: Elite Stance. (1...12...15 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and move 25% faster. You take double damage.

Name: Protector's Defense
Description: Skill. (5...10...11 seconds.) Allies adjacent to you have 75% chance to block. Ends if you move.

Name: Protector's Strike
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage if target is moving.

Name: Pure Strike
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...24...30 damage. Unblockable unless you are in a stance.

Name: Quivering Blade
Description: Elite Sword Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (5 seconds) if target foe was moving.

Name: Rage of the Ntouka
Description: Elite Skill. You gain 1...6...7 adrenaline. For 10 seconds
Adrenaline: adrenal skills have a 5 second recharge when used.

Name: Renewing Smash
Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. You gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

Name: Renewing Smash (PvP)
Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. You gain 3 energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

Name: Riposte
Description: Skill. (8 seconds). You block the next melee attack and your attacker takes 20...68...80 damage. No effect unless you have a sword equipped.

Description: Sword Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: deals +1...32...40 damage if action was a spell.

Name: Seeking Blade
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...16...20 damage. Deals 1...16...20 damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (25 seconds) if blocked.

Description: Elite Stance. (3...17...20 seconds.) Weapon attributes are increased by +1...12...15. You attack 33% faster. PvE Skill

Name: Sever Artery
Description: Sword Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...21...25 seconds).

Name: Shield Bash
Description: Skill. (5...10...11 seconds.) You block the next attack skill. Causes knock-down and +15 second recharge if it was a melee skill. No effect unless you are wielding a shield.

Name: Shield Stance
Description: Stance. (1...5...6 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Damage is reduced by 2 for each rank of Strength (maximum 15 damage reduction). No effect unless you have a shield equipped.

Name: Shove
Description: Elite Touch Skill. Causes knockdown. Initial effect: ends foe's stance and deals 15...63...75 damage if target foe is moving.

Name: Signet of Stamina
Description: Signet. You have +50...250...300 maximum Health. Ends if you hit with an attack.

Name: Silverwing Slash
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...32...40 damage.

Description: Elite Stance. (4...9...10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.

Name: Soldier's Strike
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. Unblockable if you are under the effects of a chant or shout.

Description: Hammer Attack. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Sun and Moon Slash

Name: Swift Chop
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +1...16...20 damage. Deals 1...16...20 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (20 seconds) if blocked.

Name: Symbolic Strike
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +12 damage (maximum 70) for each signet you have equipped.

Name: Thrill of Victory
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +20...36...40 damage. If you have more Health than your target

Name: Tiger Stance
Description: Stance. (4...9...10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. Ends if you fail to hit.

Description: Elite Skill. (5...29...35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. No Energy gain if you have more than 10...22...25 Energy.
